recipesJson.name: Dillinger's Dairy
recipesJson.author: Kriswk
recipesJson.description:
Your favorite dessert tobacco drenched in a sweet pistachio vanilla milkshake and sprinkled with almonds that are coated with brown sugar.
Give it a week at least just to let the tobacco settle down and for the caramel to darken the creamy vanilla.
Best after 2-3 weeks.

Notes @ [/r/DIY_ejuice](https://www.reddit.com/r/DIY_eJuice/comments/599gk9/recipe_dillingers_dairy/)

reviews.text: I dunno, maybe i mixed this when I was high but I really can't seem to get into it. Very sweet, but this is the second Pistachio recipe that didn't go over well.  Probably just me ...

I don’t really get any tobacco from this at all but i also don’t consider ry4 a tobacco. Its a very good dark dirty caramel. I really don’t how to describe this either, but its a pretty tasty caramel, nutty, vanilla cream something. Excellent job man
This is definitely one of my favorite ry4 double recipes i have mixed. Definitely get the milkshake profile from this. Spot on!
Excellent! I'll always have some of this on-hand. A+ recipe.
My favorite recipe to date. A must mix for anybody a fan of the flavor profile.
Also subbed TPA VBIC.  Love it!
Subbed TPA VBIC but this is excellent. Thanks for sharing. 10 days steep it was delicious
